title: Best of The Herd: 10/01/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/01/2019
description:
After the Steelers blow out the Bengals on Monday Night Colin says Pittsburgh's season is over and explains why. Colin questions why Jason Garrett doesn't get any blame for the Cowboys loss to the Saints and the public always rushes to blame Dak Prescott. He reveals his top ten NFL teams in the Herd Hierarchy. Plus, Snoop Dogg comes in studio to defend his Steelers against Colin's criticisms and explain why the Lakers are still better than the Clippers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
